page.title: 05GLYNDE GHOSTS
page.content: At{Glyndebourne}some new stairs were put in and where the old stairs used to be a lady in blue was seen, but only half of her! At{Glynde Place}the owner found a key which had a label saying the Ghost Room, but he cannot find a door it fits. There was a Poltergeist there too so in the end a vicar came and said some prayers and the Poltergeist wasn't heard of again. At the{Mill House}a man had lived who woke every morning at four and counted his money. The lady living there now woke up at 4 o'clock in the morning when she first went to live there. Also when she first went to{church}she automatically sat in a certain pew. She found that it was the one the Mill House people always sat in, though she had not previously know that.
